mapper.select: SELECT w.widx, p.pidx, m.midx, m.mName, p.pPrice, p.pBrandeng, p.pBrandkr, p.pNamekr, p.pNameEng, p.pFile1, p.pColor, p.pFile1 FROM wish w, product p, member m WHERE w.pidx=p.pidx AND w.midx = m.midx AND w.midx=#{midx} ORDER BY widx

SELECT w.widx, p.pidx, m.midx, m.mName, p.pPrice, p.pBrandeng, p.pBrandkr, p.pNamekr, p.pNameEng, p.pFile1, p.pColor, p.pFile1 FROM wish w, product p, member m WHERE w.pidx=p.pidx AND w.midx = m.midx AND w.midx=#{midx} ORDER BY widx DESC LIMIT #{rowStart},8
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wish WHERE widx IN #{widx}
